pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Delphi Epidata API ClientThis package provides a programmatic interface to[Delphi](https://delphi.cmu.edu/)'s epidemiological data ("epidata")API. Source code and usage information can be found at[https://github.com/cmu-delphi/delphi-epidata](https://github.com/cmu-delphi/delphi-epidata).
